content: the country weekend shawl shown in dimond laine big birdie in color butter mint country weekend shawl by jennifer evans for the lamb & kid both cozy and sophisticated this shawl is a quick knit it features a five-inch wide staghorn cable spine framed by ribbed fabric the finished piece is texture-rich cuddly and cloud-like wrap it up snugly around your neck or tuck it under your coat
